column4: Does anyone have an idea why my audio desyncs with the video when recording with gtk-recordmydesktop?
No. Tried installing it, and tweaking the settings trying to get it to work for two days, then gave up. My soundcard is HDA Intel, at least in Mixer control
I seemed to get get good sync but I would have to load Ardour and qjackctrl and then start gtk-RMD ... idk, it's tricky...
